description: GuGuai Game Accelerator Installer - Network acceleration tool for gaming

script: Write-Host 'GuGuai Accelerator installer downloaded to:' -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host 'Run the installer manually or use: guguai' -ForegroundColor Cyan

notes: INSTALLER PACKAGE: This downloads the GuGuai Accelerator installer executable.
The installer must be run manually to complete the software installation.
Use 'guguai' command or navigate to the installation directory to run the installer.
